attributes.action: Rename Moscow Road to Kyiv Road
attributes.additional_details: Names are associated with a certain nation or country. What is being done by this country, we can all see. So everything Russian must go.
attributes.background: Rename Moscow Road in London to Kyiv Road

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about local road names are a matter for the relevant local authority, not the UK Government or Parliament.
